message: Google Buzz is gone away! https://mail.google.com/support/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=1698228&topic=1669052 even that i don't use it but i feel they used people like testing rats!
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Google Buzz is going away, but your posts are yours to keep - Gmail Help
caption: mail.google.com
description: In a few weeks we'll be retiring Google Buzz. At that time you won't be able to create any new posts, but your existing content will remain accessible in two ways: You can view it on your Google Pro
